definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

pinyin: zhan1 ran3 cheng2 du4 jian3 cha2 yi2

sentences.english: However, satisfaction also appears to be influenced by psychologic factors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，滿意程度似乎也是整個身體的影響因素之一。

sentences.english: For degree of differentiation, Shitanhu population is higher than that of Gutang population.
sentences.chinese: 分化程度石潭湖羣體高於古塘羣體。

sentences.english: In some extend, I am not a hypercritical person about food.
sentences.chinese: 在某種程度上，我對於食物是一點都不挑剔的。
夜晚的污染程度則會下降。

sentences.english: Any deviation from this ideal must be penalized to the extent of the deviation.
sentences.chinese: 任何偏離這個理想，必須扣分的偏差程度。

sentences.english: It is simply that the tactic should always respond to the rival in the way that astonishes him most.
sentences.chinese: 就是說一個戰術應該最大程度地引起對手的驚訝。

sentences.english: The amount of electrolyte leakage was highly related to the treating time and concentration of toxin.
sentences.chinese: 且電解質外滲的程度與毒素濃度和處理時間呈正比。

sentences.english: The higher the anode is humidified , the more water will migrate from anode to cathode.
sentences.chinese: 陽極增溼程度越大，由陽極向陰極遷移的水量越多。

sentences.english: Light the degree of coloring for object is called color rendering.
sentences.chinese: 光源對於物體顏色呈現的程度稱爲顯色性。

sentences.english: These characteristics are found, though in a lesser degree, in the bitch.
sentences.chinese: 這些特徵在雌性身上也有，只是程度略輕一些。

sentences.english: She clings to Monty to the point he doesn't have any time alone.
sentences.chinese: 她粘蒙提甚至到了根本不給他任何獨處的時間的程度。

sentences.english: Your goal is to mitigate the risks of exploiting vulnerabilities to an acceptable level.
sentences.chinese: 您的目標是將漏洞被利用的風險減輕到可接受的程度。

sentences.english: The Observatory explained that the average wind speed in Victoria Harbour did not reach storm force level.
sentences.chinese: 天文臺解釋，是維港港內普遍風速未達烈風程度。

sentences.english: When the women reached age 40, Leupp measured their levels of depression .
sentences.chinese: 等到她們40歲時，萊普分別測試她們的抑鬱程度。

sentences.english: Therefore, these auto market pussyfooter, will affect Hangzhou city auto market to a great extent.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這些車市觀望者，將很大程度上影響杭城車市。

sentences.english: Which class level would you like to enroll in?
sentences.chinese: 你預定想念哪一個程度的班別？

definition: stage/degree (to which a situation has evolved)/situation/leeway
from this, it can be seen that...
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
as for/as to/to go so far as to
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
